name: TrustedReviews - ads removed
description: Trusted Reviews are sneaky with their ads. Please alert me to any I've missed.
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("trustedreviews.com") {

#sky-right,
#mid-sky,
#sky-left,
#article-mpu,
#bottom-sky,
#compare-prices,
#top-sky,
.videothumb,
#afc,
#web-news,
html > body > div > div > table,
h3.video_box,
div#more_videos,
#bits,
#latest-articles-count,
#latest-news-count,
#afc-c,
#footer,
#eelkpcptv-13984,
#hug-9087,
#newsletter-signup,
tbody,
h4,
#menu-sky-left-container > a > img,
#menu-sky-left-container > a
{ display: none !important; }


#screen #main #menu-sky-left-container #menu
{ margin-bottom: 0px!important; }


#screen #main #content #page-navigation
{ margin-top: 16px !important }

#content,
#screen,
#menu-sky-left-container > div[style^="border-top:"]
{ border: none !important }

#content > div.latest-news + div[style] { clear: both !important; }

} 

/*With many thanks to HKK & srazzano!*/
